The advisor now assumes this profile to tweet the president's speech during the signing of infrastructure contracts with the gov. of SP.
RT @blogplanalto: #AoVivo - Ceremony signing of infrastructure contracts with @governosp. Follow: http://t.co/5pNm3NK9Gl
We are signing two very important contracts for São Paulo, which will improve the quality of life of Paulistas.
Over the next four years, I will continue the relationship we have built throughout my government and Governor Geraldo Alckmin.
The first contract is very relevant: it will finance a water production system.
With this, we put another initiative in the agenda of the resolution of the serious water crisis that passes the state.
As we did in the Northeast, we have to prepare the Country to guarantee a security before something we do not control, which is the climate.
The extension of Line 9 of CPTM is extremely relevant, we recognize the importance of this contract. We released resources for construction of 4.4 km.
We have been doing this partnership since the beginning of 2011. During this period we had a series of common initiatives.
During the campaign, it is natural to diverge and criticize. However, once elected we have to respect the legitimate choices of the population.
In a country that values ​​democracy, these republican and partner relations are extremely necessary.

Brothers and sisters, we have clearly seen in recent days the participation of our people in the Gulf countries for our celebrations of the National Day.

We were pleased with the participation of the Kingdom and the people of our celebrations .. We saw the activities of our people from the Sultanate .. Our brothers from Kuwait in the forefront and also from Bahrain and Qatar
As we have heard the posts of Arab countries sister and beloved .. Many governments and personalities of the Arab love of the UAE as well as its children residing in us
Our national holiday was a Gulf and Arab holiday this year. The participation of our brothers gave it a new color and a special joy. All thanks and all appreciation to all leaders and peoples

With these participations, love grows. In this spirit, the brothers take hold and the house grows stronger and closer. Thank you to everyone who contributed, presented, directed and supported ... from the heart. Thank you.
Over the last few days, we have been delicated with the celebrations of our national day by our brothers in the GCC & Arab countries.
Such shared moments deepen our bond and strengthen our brotherly ties. Thanks from our hearts to everyone who celebrated with us.
